adrFormatAddress: 41 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I had a great first appointment! The front desk staff was friendly and welcoming and the dental hygienist was great. The Dentist (Dr. Sonya) spent a good amount of time with me and told me what my options were for coming back to get some fillings replaced. Not that this matters as much but it’s SO cute inside and super easy to get to right off the 2/3 or L. Will be back!

originalText.text: This review is to warn you not to make appointments with this office through ZocDoc. They use it for advertising to get new patients but they will then reschedule you for a month later as they don't actually have the appointments listed. Was able to book with a different dentists office without any issue.

They use it for advertising to get new patients but they will then reschedule you for a month later as they don't actually have the appointments listed. originalText.text: I used to dread going to the dentist.  But now that I'm a patient at Dental House,  that unhappy feeling is GONE.  I recently needed to have an old crown re-secured on my tooth, and my experience that day could not have been more pleasant.  Dr. Irina and Dr. Sonya are both delightful, gifted professionals.  Every time I walk through the front door, I feel welcomed and beautifully cared for by every member of the staff.  The office is lovely and serene and spa-like.  Dental House is a dream-come-true for anyone looking for happier, kinder care of your teeth!

originalText.text: Dr. Sonya was amazing. She was very empathetic, careful and effective. The doctors office is brand-new, clean and bright. The staff was super nice and supportive, very welcoming. I can definitely recommend and will go back.

text.text: Dr. Sonya was amazing. She was very empathetic, careful and effective. The doctors office is brand-new, clean and bright. The staff was super nice and supportive, very welcoming. I can definitely recommend and will go back.

originalText.text: One of the best Dental offices. Office is clean, staff is polite and professional. Doctors explain every detail, answer all questions. Love it. Very high recommended. Thank you and happy new year.
